mapper.sql: id, user_id, comeby, commission, ct, mt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commission_detail (id, user_id, comeby, commission, ct, mt) VALUES (#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.comeby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.commission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.ct,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.mt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

INSERT INTO commission_detail
id,
user_id,
comeby,
commission,
ct,
mt,

mapper.update: UPDATE commission_detail SET user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, comeby = #{comeby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, commission = #{commission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ct = #{ct,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mt = #{mt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE commission_detail
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
